revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #18 Aguav |image = [[File:Aguav.png]] |caption = This Berry turns bitter toward the stem. The dainty flower it grows from doesn't absorb much sunlight. |growtime = 5m 50s |harvest = 17 berries |replant = 30% |points = 55 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *15 bitter *0 sour }} '''Aguav''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 25, but no more than 80 points of bitter and less than 5 points of all other flavours. The [[Rawst]] berry must be unlocked to obtain this berry. == Growth Tables == === Growth Stages === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 secs || 2 mins 50 secs || 3 mins 40 secs || 5 mins 50 secs - 11 mins 40 secs |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:AguavTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Ripening Time with Modifiers === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time |- ! None | 5 mins 50 secs -
11 mins 40 secs |- ! Sprayduck | 3 mins 53 secs -
7 mins 47 secs |} == Flow Chart ==
{| style="text-align: center;" |+ '''Flow Chart to get this berry''' |- | Random
Drop |- | ↓ |- | [[File:Rawst.png|20px]] [[Rawst]] |- | ↓ |- | [[File:Aguav.png|20px]] [[Aguav]] |}
== Mutation Strategy == === Possible Planting Formations === You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Aguav berries. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || || || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |- | [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] || [[File:Rawst.png|30px]] [[Rawst]] |} {{Berries}}
